title: Now's The Time to Switch to a Password Manager !
tags: Now's The Time to Switch to a Password Manager !
How to Switch to a New Password Manager
description: A recent update in Google Chrome makes it easy to switch to a Password manager of your choice. So, if you are looking for a switch, here's how you can import all your saved Google Chrome Password to LastPass.   Go to - chrome://flags/#password-export on chrome, and set the Password export feature to Enabled, and relaunch the browser.
